oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Display box of medals and insignia of Lt. James J. Coghlan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The display box shows both full sized medals and insignia, the ribbon bar and minatures of the medals awarded to Lt. James Coghlan of the 55th Inf. Regt. The medals include the Purple Heart (for being gassed), the Silver Star, the WWI Victory Medal, the Mexican Border Service Medal. Also present are his US collar insignia, the 55th Infantry Regt. insignia, and his identificaiton disks (i.e. dog tags) suspended on a cotton cord. An article in the case relates that his medals were stolen and some returned.
